data.title: Free Drum Transcriptions
data.text:
DOWNLOAD FREE DRUM TRANSCRIPTIONS AND EXERCISES!

After teaching drum lessons for so many years, I was inspired by a colleague of mine to include this page of drum charts/drum transcriptions and exercises that I've made for students over the years. I've taken some liberties with the transcriptions as most of my students have five piece drum sets with only a pair of hi hats, a crash and a ride. It is important to note that these are my interpretations of the songs as well. Please check back regularly for new additions and feel free to download them for yourself!

I post all new transcriptions on my social networking sites - be sure to connect to stay current!
